3. How We Use Your Information.
If you submit to us (or to third-parties acting on our behalf) any Personal Data relating to other individuals in connection with your use of the Services, you represent that you have the authority to do so and permit us to use the information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.
These cookies are used to collect information about how you interact with our website and allow us to remember you.
We use this information in order to improve and customize your browsing experience and for analytics and metrics about our visitors both on this website and other media.
We will otherwise retain your information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you Services as well as is necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements.
Application Data IR collects Application Data when our products are deployed in your IT environment.

We collect only the information necessary for these purposes.
We use the information we collect to provide you targeted advertising based upon your interests.

Our website includes social media features, such as the Facebook "Like" button and widgets, such as the "Share this" button or interactive mini-programs that run on our website.
These features may collect your IP address, which pages you are visiting on our website, and may set Cookies to enable the feature to function properly.
We use local shared objects, also known as Flash cookies, when we provide you with video content.
Some Services may collect messages being sent and received from your Contact Centre so that we can convey those messages to and from carrier networks.
During this process, a third party may collect Personal Data or Non-Personal Data from you.
Our ad network partner may use Cookies and web beacons to automatically collect Non-Personal Data about your activities on this and other websites.

However, we make every effort to secure your data by working closely with trusted third-party vendors and hosting partners needed to run the IR Services.
Such hosting partners utilize security measures including physical premises, network, and identify access management security practices.

text: We may receive reports based on the use of certain technologies by these companies on an individual and aggregated basis.
